creature.name: amazoness archer
creature.description: You see an amazoness archer. She handles her bow quite well and her arrows are very dangerous when she shoots them at you out of the forest!

creature.name: 亚马逊阿彻指挥官
creature.description: 这是一个亚马逊弓箭手指挥官. 她是亚马逊弓箭手的领袖. 她的弓箭射穿一切.

creature.name: 亚马逊保镖
creature.description: 你会看到一个亚马逊的保镖, 他会保证亚马逊岛居民的安全.

creature.name: 亚马逊海岸警卫队
creature.description: 这是的是亚马逊海岸警卫队. 她保护亚马逊岛海岸免受入侵者的侵袭. 她不太高兴看到你在她的岛上跑.

creature.name: 亚马逊海岸警卫队的情妇
creature.description: 这是一个亚马逊海岸警卫队的情妇. 即使他们是女人, 这些蓝头发的情妇也不应该被低估.

creature.name: 亚马逊指挥官
creature.description: 你会看到一个亚马逊的指挥官, 专门消灭任何陌生人谁敢走一步到她的岛屿.

creature.name: 亚马逊精英海岸警卫队
creature.description: 这是的是亚马孙精锐海岸警卫队. 当轮到她来保护这个岛时, 你只会希望呆在家里.

creature.name: 亚马逊猎人
creature.description: 这是一个亚马逊猎人. 她蹑手蹑脚地穿过森林去猎捕动物. 但她不喜欢你在她的狩猎区

creature.name: 亚马逊警卫
creature.description: 这是了亚马逊警卫. 她的感觉很好, 所以当你不想让她听到你的时候, 你必须保持沉默!

creature.name: 亚马逊最高统治者
creature.description: 你会看到一个亚马逊帝国的统治者. 她是亚马逊岛的皇帝, 统治了亚马逊岛几十年, 不会让你轻易通过她.

creature.name: 强盗
creature.description: 这是一个又瘦又卑鄙的强盗. 他想要你的命和钱包!

creature.name: 刺客门徒
creature.description: 这是一个刺客门徒. 他很年轻, 但他已经学会了战斗和杀戮.

creature.name: 学徒刺客
creature.description: 这是一个学徒刺客. 他被教导了一些非常可怕的行动和方法, 所以他已经能够杀死一个敌人几乎完美

noise.value: 来吧, 我谅你也不敢.
任何时候你都准备好了.
我看上的猎物难逃我的手心!

creature.name: assassin
creature.description: You see an assassin. He is very good at killing his victims silently without being seen by anyone.

creature.name: 忍者
creature.description: 你敏锐的眼睛使你能够看到这个快速忍者. 准备战斗!

creature.name: 武士
creature.description: if he failed to uphold his honor he could only regain it by performing seppuku

creature.name: 影子刺客
creature.description: 这是一个影子刺客. 他知道如何与阴影合而为一, 在黑暗中移动而不被看见或发出任何声音.

creature.name: 刺客大师
creature.description: 这是的是刺客大师. 他是个暗杀高手!他可以杀死一个敌人而不让他知道他已经在那里!

creature.name: 布拉德鲁军队
creature.description: 你会看到一个人, 他放弃了他的生活作为一个傀儡的布拉德鲁军队, 所有的爱龙. 他是非常快乐的.

noise.value: 我们也许在躲藏, 但我们仍然强大.

creature.name: 布拉德鲁下士
creature.description: 你要明白, 一个人觉得他的过去表明了他现在应该受到怎样的对待, 但却不情愿地希望在一场国际象棋游戏中锻炼他的才智.

noise.value: 你会给我们应有的尊重.
想下棋吗?你喜欢下棋吗?

creature.name: 布拉德鲁风暴骑兵
creature.description: 你要明白, 作为费乌莫尼最可怕的敌人之一, 他只是过去荣耀的一小部分. 现在, 他主要关心的是保持他的房子干净整洁.

noise.value: 在进入我们的领地之前, 先擦擦脚.
我要教训你们玷污我们的圣所.

creature.name: 女性食人族
creature.description: 女性食人族, 她想取你的骨头炖汤！

creature.name: 食人族
creature.description: You see a cannibal. 一个食人族. 他正思考怎样把你的鲜肉拿来做菜！除非他能明白你的肉不吃好, 否则最好远离他!

creature.name: 混沌士兵
creature.description: You see a 混沌士兵. 混沌士兵s are servants of the evil. Killing you is one of their evil plans.

creature.name: 混沌勇士
creature.description: You see a 混沌勇士. This chaotic creature is fighting with a big blade to slay his enemies.

creature.name: 混沌司令
creature.description: You see a 混沌司令 who is working on an evil plan. You should take care of him before he fulfills his duty.

creature.name: 混沌巫师
creature.description: You see a 混沌巫师. 混沌巫师s will cast some evil spells on you if you don't obey them.

noise.value: I will summon chaos and fury upon you!

creature.name: 混沌龙骑士
creature.description: You see a 混沌龙骑士. He is very well trained in dragon riding, but he can also fight well on the ground.

creature.name: 混沌领主
creature.description: You see a 混沌领主 who is one of the strongest chaos creatures in Faiumoni. You should prepare well before attacking him.

creature.name: 混沌君主
creature.description: You see a 混沌君主. It is him who directs the creation of evil plans and gives orders to all chaotic creatures which exist.

noise.value: I am become death, destroyer of worlds.

creature.name: 黑方卒
creature.description: You see a pawn for a game of chess. He will drop nothing if you kill him.

creature.name: 黑方车
creature.description: You see a rook for a game of chess. He will drop nothing if you kill him.

creature.name: 黑方马
creature.description: You see a knight for a game of chess. He will drop nothing if you kill him.

creature.name: 黑方象
creature.description: You see a bishop for a game of chess. He will not reward you if you kill him.

creature.name: 黑方帅
creature.description: You see a king of a game of chess. He will reward nothing if you kill him.

creature.name: 黑方女皇
creature.description: You see a queen piece for a game of chess. She will reward nothing if you kill her.

creature.name: 帝国精英士兵
creature.description: You see an 帝国精英士兵. He fought in many battles and wars. Now he is old, but over the years he always looked for a new enemy to fight against.

creature.name: 帝国牧师
creature.description: You see an 帝国牧师. The church has fallen out of favor with the citizens as of late, but this 帝国牧师 still clings to the faith.

creature.name: 帝国精英守卫
creature.description: You see an 帝国精英守卫. He is a very well trained guardian and he will protect his environment until the end.

creature.name: 帝国科学家
creature.description: You see an 帝国科学家. He is quite clever but also a little bit crazy and unfortunately he uses his intelligence for evil experiments.

creature.name: 帝国高级僧侣
creature.description: You see an 帝国高级僧侣 who's troubled by the actions of the imperial science department. Be careful, he might take those frustrations out on you!

creature.name: 帝国指挥官
creature.description: You see a well dressed 帝国指挥官. It's troops will try to dash you.

creature.name: 帝国将军
creature.description: You see an 帝国将军 with a huge scar above his eye. He is still strong, don't think that he will not see you!

creature.name: 帝国大梦
creature.description: You see an 帝国大梦 who stands before you. Once a powerful warlock trained by a mighty magician, but he disappeared decades ago. Now it seems he's in league with Ivan Abe!

creature.name: 卡拉文家庭主妇
creature.description: You see a 卡拉文家庭主妇. She lives in Kalavan city and she is very angry with rude people who want to steal her food out of the kitchen and destroy her beautiful flower garden!

creature.name: 卡拉文农夫
creature.description: You see a 卡拉文农夫. He works in the fields around Kalavan city. As he heard there were strangers in the city he came to help the 卡拉文居民s in fighting the enemies!

creature.name: 卡拉文女白领
creature.description: You see a 卡拉文女白领. Normally she sits in her small room and does some handworking but now she wants to have some action!

creature.name: 卡拉文居民
creature.description: You see a 卡拉文居民. He lives in kalavan city and tries to protect it from invaders!

creature.name: 红方兵
creature.description: You see a pawn for a game of chess. It will reward nothing if killed.

creature.name: 红方车
creature.description: You see a rook for a game of chess. It will scarcely reward you to kill it.

creature.name: 红方马
creature.description: You see a knight, a chess piece. He won't reward you if you kill him.

creature.name: 红方相
creature.description: You see a bishop for a game of chess. It will reward you nothing if you slay it.

creature.name: 红方将
creature.description: You see a king to play chess with, he will reward you nothing if you kill him.

creature.name: 红方女王
creature.description: You see a queen piece for a game of chess. She will reward nothing if you kill her.

creature.name: mithrilbourgh general
creature.description: You see a mithrilbourgh general. Some call him Hawkeyes. He cast his gaze over the city walls and saw you coming from miles away.

creature.name: monk
creature.description: You see a monk. Monks are very calm and peaceful. They live alone among themselves, but they don't want to be interrupted by anyone.

noise.value: The end of the world is nigh...

creature.name: darkmonk
creature.description: You see a Darkmonk. Darkmonks can control dark powers, and they will do anything to get you out of their way!

creature.name: devil monk
creature.description: You see a devil monk. He is a member of a devil cult which practises black rituals.

creature.name: risecia thug
creature.description: You see a risecia thug, stay away from him!

creature.name: risecia archer
creature.description: You see a risecia archer, just one of the warriors who wants to protect his chief.

creature.name: risecia swordsman
creature.description: You see a risecia swordsman, the blade of his sword will cut your head!

creature.name: Chief Falatheen of the Risecia
creature.description: You see the Chief Falatheen of the Risecia, he doesn't want to die! His little warriors protect him against invaders.

creature.name: littlewitch
creature.description: You see a little witch. These little girls are witches and that makes them very dangerous.

creature.name: littlewizard
creature.description: You see a little wizard. Although he is a child, he is already able to cast powerful spells.
